git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@1 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@2 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added CVS tags to comments (Id and Log).
Changed all uses of assert() in JUnit tests to assertTrue(). assert() has been
deprecated because it is a builtin keyword in Java 1.4.
Fixed build.xml to test correctly after compile and to add CVS targets.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@7 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Removed annoying log blocks from the top of all source files.

Changed commit target to tag the newly checked in source with
project-date-time.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@9 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@32 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a few test cases.  Split test files into two separate files.  From

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@49 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

insert and remove in ReducedModel no longer return a vector of StateBlocks.
To access this information a second function was added to SBGenerator that
takes a third argument specifying the absolute location the function is
being called from. Two functions were added to DefinitionsDocument to check
1)whether the highlight information has changed and 2) get the changes.
This commit always returns change is true and will return for the demanded
changes a vector of all blocks following the insert or remove.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@116 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1. Totally changed around the way we display definitions. Previously, to
   do the color highlighting we wanted, we changed the styles associated with
   the characters in the document, by having the document be a StyledDocument.
   Now instead we treat the document as a plain text file that also has
   associated with it some information about the status of parts of the file
   (commented, quoted, keyword, etc). Then, to render different parts of the
   document in different visual styles, we use our own View class (ColoringView,
   which is in DefinitionsEditorKit.java) to consult the reduced model
   to figure out what style to use to display text.
   See DefinitionsEditorKit.java for more details.

   This change caused all the deleting of files, since they contributed to the
   old system.

2. Changed build file to tell the JSR14 compiler to produce class files that
   will run on JDK 1.2. Previously it generated class files with version #46.0,
   which won't run on JDK 1.2. (The symptom is ClassNotFoundError!)

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@133 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1. Totally new UI for compiler errors. Now they all come up in one text pane,
   but the text pane acts a lot like a list box. (You can highlight items, etc.)
   Right now it doesn't do anything when you click on it. I'll fix this soon.
2. Interactions and compile output are now in a tabbed pane together at the
   bottom of the screen. This lets us only have two visible panes at a time.
3. Fixed problem where classes compiled in the REPL were not able to be reloaded
   when they were changed. The problem occurred if the classes were in the
   class path. If they were in the normal class path, the system class loader
   would load them, and thus they could never be reloaded. The problem didn't
   happen in other cases because the system loader didn't find them, so
   DynamicJava's loader loaded them. And that loader gets thrown away on
   every recompile.

   So, to fix this, I made a new subclass of DynamicJava's TreeInterpreter
   and also its TreeClassLoader (see DynamicJavaAdapter.java). The loader
   uses tricks from the NextGen loader: It always tries to load classes itself,
   even before letting the system try. This ensures they are reloadable later.

look for \n.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@204 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

More refactoring on ReducedModelComment.  Destroyed _insertBrace function
since nothing was using it.  Tried to convert calls to _breakComment to use
_splitCurrentIfCommentBlock but there are subtle differences to where the
cursor ends up that need to be addressed before we can blow away
_breakComment.  However, the functions are similar enough to warrant
removing one, and _breakComment is the better choice.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@206 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Got rid of duplicate function _breakComment and replaced it with a call to
_splitCurrentIfCommentBlock surrounded by state modifications so it behaved
correctly.  The code in insertGap of course assumed the previous conditions
left by breakComment, so I had to make it assume the conditions left by
splitCurrentIfCommentBlock.  The two functions were practically the same,
differing only where they left the cursor and the fact that
splitCurrentIfCommentBlock has extra control over whether to break block
comment ends and escape sequences via booleans passed in as arguments.

1. Package parsing in source files was totally incorrect in various weird cases

   I wrote a new (correct!) algorithm.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@287 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1. Modified DynamicJavaAdapter to use new extended EvaluationVisitor
   to do evaluation.
2. Added EvaluationVisitorExtension, which changes evaluation in two ways:
     (i)  It now returns JavaInterpreter.NO_RESULT if there was no result
          (as opposed to null), and
     (ii) It now checks if the Thread was interrupted at every stage of
          evaluation, and throws an exception if it was interrupted. This
          will let us run the interpreter in a separate thread and
          then be able to kill it.
3. Created ThreadedInterpreterWrapper, a class to contain a JavaInterpreter
   (presently hard-coded to be DynamicJavaAdapter but that is easy to fix)
   and present an interface to deal with the interpreter asynchronously.
   This class contains a Thread to run the interpreter in, and it handles
   all of the complex synchronization stuff.
4. Created (a few) test cases for ThreadedInterpreterWrapper. We should add
   a lot more before we integrate the new functionality with the UI.

Note that the threaded interpreter implementation is not currently
connected to the GlobalModel. Stay tuned.

   access to CS.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@340 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed DynamicJavaAdapter.ClassLoaderExtension to use a StickyClassLoader to do
its work. One outcome of this change (and some debugging) was that I fixed
the definition of classes inside the REPL to work! Fixing this required making sure
that ClassLoaderExtension and InterpreterExtension were not loaded using the new
loader (which would load a new copy) and instead used the old, already-loaded versions.

I also added a test case to show that anonymous inner class definitions work.

1) Undo/redo are back!
2) System.out goes to interactions too (in green). We can debate this feature later,
   and also we should make it configurable.
3) Fixed race condition after aborting interactions that sometimes caused
   the interactions window to not have the correct classpath after an abort.

Note: A problem I see now but have not yet fixed is that indent is considered for undo
as some insertions and removals. It really should be considered as one atomic event.
Doing this would require a bunch of messing with how the undo/redo events are generated,
and it's not trivial. This is why I didn't implement this. We should do it at some
point, though.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@410 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed StickyClassLoader to always load sun.* from
the system class loader. Sigh, undocumented stuff :). It's to ensure
that sun.reflect.* is loaded only once. (sun.reflect appears to be
a new package structure from JDK1.4.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@412 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1) Fixed #508613: Compile errors go to standard error too. Oh, the fix is ugly,
   since it has to do different things for JDK1.3 vs JDK1.4!
2) Implemented feature #508616: Make compiler location configurable.
   We use a temporary configuration system to do this. Documentation
   on setting this up is available at
   https://sourceforge.net/docman/display_doc.php?docid=9158&group_id=44253
   Note: This configuration system *will* change in a future version!

   Since I did this, I decided against feature #505873: Detect whether javac
   supports generics. The only way I was able to consistently do it was by test
   compiling something with generics and checking for errors. This was slow.
   So, now since you can explicitly configure a jsr14 location, it's not
   necessary to detect generics support.
3) Implemented feature #509302: Make GJv6 not show up in compiler list on 1.4.
   We just check the java version property and fail to load if it's too high.
   Now it's safe to have GJ around (and to have its compiler adapter in the
   list of default compiler adapters) even if you might run 1.4.
   Perhaps we should re-add GJ to the distribution?
4) Fixed #508642: Compiler shows up as "unavailable". Stupid me -- before,
   CompilerRegistry was not checking .isAvailable on each compiler after
   instantiating it before putting it in the available list.
5) Implemented feature #509385: Allow additions to classpath. It's part of the
   temporary configuration framework.
6) Fixed annoyance: Interactions pane was editable after the interactions
   JVM was exited but before it came back.
7) Made about box better.
8) Changed DefaultGlobalModel.quit() to not explictly kill the interpreter
   JVM. By killing the other JVM, we started a race between the System.exit
   call and the creation of a new JVM. Instead, we let the interpreter JVM
   dangle, since it will kill itself when it detects that the main JVM is
   gone. This seems easiest for now -- though another answer would be
   to add a method to MainJVM to kill the interpreter without a restart.
   This would, however, put MainJVM into a strange, dead state.

   (This problem came up because I noticed that GlobalModelOtherTest was
    sometimes telling me that interactionsReset was called unexpectedly
    after quit() was called. This made me realize that a new interpreter
    JVM had been created after quitting!)

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@422 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed problems in test cases on Windows, which were due to the difference
in the filesystem semantics between Windows and UNIX! See:

http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4045014.html

for the description of the problem. The solution was to ensure that
any file opened via a Reader/InputStream/Writer/OutputStream has its
.close() method called explicitly, or else the file will not be deletable!


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@423 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed problems in test cases on Windows, which were due to the difference
in the filesystem semantics between Windows and UNIX! See:

http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4045014.html

for the description of the problem. The solution was to ensure that
any file opened via a Reader/InputStream/Writer/OutputStream has its
.close() method called explicitly, or else the file will not be deletable!

I also cleaned up FileOpsTest, by having it ensure that all delete() calls
actually succeed.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@435 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed the split pane to use whatever default borders that come with
the operating system.  This causes each split pane to provide 1 border
in MacOS-X, and creates a shadowed/bevel border on JDK for Windows.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@437 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed MainFrame so that only the outer border is a JSplitPane, while the split pane that contains the definitions window and the file list is a BorderlessSplitPane.  This causes only 1 border to show up in MacOS-X, and in Windows.  If both of them use JSplitPanes, then MacOS-X will nest two borders (which caused the original bug request).  However, no borders looks unappealing in Windows.  I hope this is a good compromise.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@439 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

to the menubar.  Also, the file name field is now displayed
in a JLabel at the bottom of the frame, rather than in the

The icons themselves were obtained from Sun, and can be found
in a Jar at the following address:
http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/techDocs/hi/repository/

Added three more question nodes to the indentation tree with tests:
QuestionLineContains, QuestionStartingNewStmt and QuestionExistsCharInStmt
(previously known as QuestionInTernary).

Added a helper method to DefinitionsDocument called findCharOnLine(int pos,
char findChar). It searches for the given character on the line where the given
position is. The code for this helper was previously in QuestionLineContains,
but was abstracted out to this method. The testing for this function still
resides in QuestionLineContainsTest, however, and should probably be moved to
IndentHelperTest.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@563 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed a potential typing bug --

an OptionMap should not get an Enumeration<Option<Object>> but an
Enumeration<OptionParser<Object>> since OptionParser<Object> only
promises that the parsing result be an object.  An Option<T> is not
really a subclass of Option<Object> since the format(T val) method
accepts input of type T, not of type object.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@565 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@623 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1) Changed build script to only put drjava, util and lib directories into the source
distributions. This means that if you accidently have your CVS root set wrong, you
should get an error, instead of building a source distribution with the wrong code!

2) Fixed problem that after going through the compiler-picking process, the UI
did not reflect that a compiler was chosen. This was due to MainFrame having been
constructed before the compiler process was over. (See DrJava.java.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@625 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@629 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed Options to be aware of their default values, so that all the
information about a global option and its default can be stored in the
OptionConstants interface.

Changed OptionMapLoader to reflectively load things based off the
OptionConstants interface, and OptionMapLoaderTest accordingly.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@631 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Line numbers revamped and re-enabled in GUI.  Uses safer helper methods at
mild speed cost, but still good performance in most common cases.  Slow cases include jumping forward several hundred lines, and deleting a block of text at the end of a large document.

Line numbers ready for release.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@637 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed a bug with inaccurate column display after siwtching documents.  Seems that after switching, docs position is the beginning of the line, so we set it to the caret position.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@639 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Improved find/replace so that the "find" text is always highlighted
and given focus when the dialog is brought up.  Also fixed Goto Line
so that it doesn't beep when you hit escape.

(Closed Feature Request 543321)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@641 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

just before switching documents, since it wasn't being stored
correctly before.  Added a test in MainFrameTest to cover it.

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@647 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1) Created new subpackage 'newjvm' and moved ExecJVM there.
2) Created abstract framework for setting up a new JVM with bidirectional
   RMI links between the JVMs. See javadoc for edu.rice.cs.util.newjvm
   for details. This new RMI scheme uses no rmiregistry!!


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@649 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1) Fixed silly problem caused by SlaveRemote not being public.
2) Added automatic functionality to AbstractSlave to ping the master JVM
   every minute to make sure it's still alive, and to automatically quit
   if it is found dead.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@651 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Migrated implementation of second JVM control to the new framework
in edu.rice.cs.util.newjvm. The user-visible behavior is preserved, most
notably that the interactions JVM is not exited when DrJava exits but it
instead kills itself after DrJava's been dead for a minute.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@653 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added missing @version tags.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@655 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Now the interactions JVM is immediately quit when DrJava quits.
Also, the quit-related test cases were refactored into GlobalModelQuitTest,
and they now check that the interpeter JVM is quit when appropriate.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@656 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a second constructor to allow additional message text for
UnexpectedException at the point where it is thrown.  This was mainly done for
my own benefit in debugging various event handling issues.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@658 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@664 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@665 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

These files are necessary for building a Mac OS X double-clickable application.  My choice of runtime properties for Info.plist are debatable and can be changed easily via the Mac OS X Property List Editor.  Documentation for the key-value pairs is available at http://developer.apple.com/technotes/tn/tn2031.html.  I have chosen to disable stdin, stderr, and stdout; enable hardware acceleration on all possible video chipsets; enable the hwaccel debug key combos; use the system menus; and use a heap size between 32M and 128M.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@667 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

The initial commit for Info.plist was polluted with classpath references specific to my machine.  They have been removed.  I have tested the new plist and it still works just fine with only a reference to the internal DrJava.jar.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@668 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Removed final modifier from isStartupInProgress, to allow subclasses
to widen access to public.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@671 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added code to interface with JSwat, commented out so that it will still
compile and run if JSwat is not in the classpath.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@673 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the JSwat .jar file to the tree.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@675 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added new JSwat integration code.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@676 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added highlighting support to DebugPanel.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@678 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added Debug menu items; implementation of same coming soon.  (Debug
interface still disabled; uncomment "//js" lines in DefaultGlobalModel
to enable.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@680 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Improved Debug MenuItems, and allowed them to be enabled and disabled.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@682 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

"Toggle breakpoint at current line" action implemented in Debug menu if
enabled.  Right now, it can add breakpoints but not remove them.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@684 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

New code in ui.DebugPanel.showFile() to highlight shown line
(breakpoint reached, step, etc.) and to undo this from a previously
highlighted line, so that only one line is highlighted at a time.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@686 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Made the JSwat debugger a configurable option, disabled by default.

To turn it on, set "debugger.enabled" to true in the .drjava file.
We'll release a document on what needs to be done to use it when
it's ready for general use.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@688 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a start() method to the DebugManager, and made it accessible
from the Debug Menu in the UI.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@690 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

- Removed line highlighting from debug to prevent reduced model bug.
- Toggling breakpoints (not just adding) to debugger, and output
  from within DebugManager can now be sent to the logwriter in DebugPane.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@692 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added menu items and support code in DebugManager for viewing all
breakpoints and for clearing all breakpoints in debugger.  Also,
debugger automatically clears all breakpoints on initialization and
shutdown.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@694 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Advanced mode debugger (JSwat console) now configurable as debugger.advanced


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@696 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed debugger (compile/toggle breakpoint)->save?->cancel bug.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@698 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added various UI improvements to the Debugger, added actions to
the DebugManager, and made the DefaultGlobalModel clean up the
debugger on quit if it's running.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@700 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Moved getClasspath from JUnit's test class loader into the
global model, and made the debugger sync its classpath with
DrJava when it inits.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@702 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added functionality to allow for clickable errors in JUnit. This closes task id
49745 on Sourceforge.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@704 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Temporarily undid changes to the new JVM invocation framework, reverting
to the new JVM handling code from drjava-20020413-2208. (Other changes
were not rolled back, however.) I will correct the problems with the
new framework and then re-commit them.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@706 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

1. Changed MainFrame to work around a Mac OS X-specific JFileChooser bug.

2. Commented out redundant scroll.setBorder(null) call in MainFrame.  (This is taken care of by the BorderlessScrollPane.)

3. Changed MainFrame, CompilerErrorPanel, and FindReplaceDialog calls to grabFocus to requestFocus instead, as recommended by the API JavaDoc.

4. Added a few lines of debug code to DefaultGlobalModel - commented out but left for future debugging.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@708 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Configuration and DefaultOptionMap enhanced with a meaningful toString, fixing bug 544595.

File title change check in MainFrame added to reduce unneccessary window redraws during editing.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@710 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

A version of DrJava with the line numbering disabled, so that we can make a release before addressing the performance concerns.  This version (drjava-20020506-0129) is considerably snappier, especially when editing at the end of long files.

I've committed these changes as an independent commit operation so that we can roll them back easily if they are contentious.  The only changes are on MainFrame lines 1432 and 1453.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@712 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

To resolve Ease of Use Issue 552664, a new config option was added:

definitions.match.color=OxC0C0C0

The line above will restore the old "Color.lightGray" match color.  The new default is RGB (190,255,230), which is a desaturated green similar to that used by XEmacs.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@714 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Removed the prompt before switching to a file that has been opened while already open.  This will be replaced with a more full-featured dialog when revert functions are available.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@716 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

In keeping with the team philosophy, did nothing.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@718 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a setResizeWeight call to resolve feature request #505936 - resizing the window will now apply changes to the main definitions pane rather than the interactions/etc. tabbed pane.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@720 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Temporarily disabled support for JUnit testing until bugs therewith can be
appropriately addressed.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@722 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Commented out GUI links to JUnit integration, which was breaking in a big way.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@724 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed bug 539571 in which compilation would occur even if some files
were modified since last save. This was a problem if errors existed in
modified files. To fix the bug, all files are required to be saved
before compilation can occur.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@726 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Closed feature requests: 544505, 552825, 537227

Implemented a system to revert an open file to the version saved on disk.
This ability is available in the File menu. Also, added ability to detect
when a file has been modified on disk by a different program. DrJava will
detect this when the active document is changed.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@728 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Implemented select-all menu feature in request 546056. Added a menu item 'Select All' and key binding ctrl-A to select all text in the current active document.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@730 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed accidental change of useDebug flag in DefaultGlobalModel. Reverted
useDebug to use value from config


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@731 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Moved global Configuration object to ConfigurationTool (an
interface).  Now DrJava inherits it from that interface, as does
OptionConstants.

Changed indenter to poll config system.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@733 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Implemented feature request 511414. Added support for opening multiple files
 in DrJava. Updated the FileOpenSelector to return a File[]. Most of the added code is in DefaultGlobalModel.openFiles()


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@735 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed DrJava to empty undo/redo history when reverting a document. Added restUndo() method in DefinitionsPane


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@737 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Improved the Interactions classpath: whenever files are
opened or saved, their source root is automatically added
to the classpath.

Also removed the saveBeforeProceeding code, since all uses
have been replaced by saveAllBeforeProceeding, and
improved some of the GUI display messages in MainFrame.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@739 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed bug 565845, pertaining to replace causing the defpane to change focus
from the replaced text back to the cursor location. Also addresses feature
request 513025 partially by making the Find/Replace dialog non-modal. In
the future, Find/Replace will be moved to a tabbed pane.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@741 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixes bug 565845, in which the replace command would cause the
definitions pane to change the view from the just-replaced word to the
cursor position instead of remaining focused on the just-replaced word.
Also addresses feature request 513025, making the find/replace dialog modal.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@743 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the user's current working directory to the model's
source root set, so that it is included in the interactions
classpath.  (Updated GlobalModelOtherTest to reflect this.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@745 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Disabled display of Test button and tab, so that a release could
be made without the JUnit fixes (which aren't quite finished yet).

Also added a check for whether a file has been modified on disk
when the window is deiconified.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@747 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Disabled Junit menu item until JUnit fixes are completed.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@749 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Used the awt Toolbox to get platform-specific shortcut masks for menu items and changed the Abort Current Interaction shortcut to resolve a conflict with the Copy operation.  This has a pleasant side effect of preventing the exit not allowed exception when using the standard Mac OS Command-Q to quit.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@751 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed NullPointerException caused by closing the Find/Replace Dialog using the
window's built-in close instead of clicking the close button. Also, changed it
so that the result of a find/result query or a gotoLine command is now centered
in the viewport instead of appearing at the bottom of the viewport.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@753 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Re-enabled JUnit testing support, following improvement of the code.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@755 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added support for custom font choices, styles, and sizes. All one must do is
include the following lines to their .drjava file, setting each equal to the
desired settings:
 (to change the Document list font name, style, or size)
 font.doclist.name
 font.doclist.style
 font.doclist.size

 (to change all other fonts within the remaining panes and panels)
 font.main.name
 font.main.style
 font.main.size

 e.g. an inclusion of:
   font.main.size = 24
     would have the effect of changing the font in every panel (besides that of
     the Document list) to point size 24.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@757 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed bug 565849.

Made changes to the Indent model and the DefinitionsDocument to correctly
indent arrays. Added class indent.QuestionHasCharPrecedingOpenBrace.

This update corrects
1. All array elements have the same and correct indentation
2. A fix to ignore multi ';' after array statements (and possibly others)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@759 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Updated package.html associated with indent library


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@761 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Several minor updates: - System.err.println removed from GlobalModelJUnitTest - Compile keyboard shortcut changed back to F5 - tag added to indent package documentation - DrJava.java indented with array-indent-bug fixed git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@763 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed an exception in FindReplaceDialog that occurred if a user
double-clicked on the close button.  (Used to throw an UnexpectedException
if the uninstallListeners method was called twice.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@765 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed two bugs concerning JUnit support:
  + DrJava previously checked only if the active document had been modified
    since its last save before proceeding with a JUnit test, rather than all
    currently open documents.
  + DrJava did not clear the JUnitErrorModels of all open  documents (upon
    which JUnit had been previously run) when a new round of JUnit testing
    had begun.
These bugs have been fixed.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@767 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added support for a  user-defined working directory via the ".drjava" file:

 e.g.
  working.directory = /home/mcgraw/javafiles/

 The ~username/ construction is not supported.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@769 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed CompilerErrorPanel so that it uses the preferred size of ComboBox.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@771 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed Find/Replace from a dialog box to a panel in the tabbed pane.
The tab is dynamic in that upon clicking the find button in MainFrame, the
find/replace tab is added to tabbed pane. Also, upon clicking the "X"
button on the find/replace panel, the tab will be removed.
FindReplaceDialog is still the name of the file containing the panel
because we wanted to avoid complications involved with removing files
from the project.

Also added the ability to toggle matching case when finding the next
occurence of a string.

Disabled the "replace all" button when the find field is empty since this was
previously causing DrJava to hang.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@773 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed Find/Replace from a dialog to a panel in the tabbed pane. It is
a dynamic tab in that upon clicking "find", the tab will be added to the
tabbed pane and upon clicking the "X" button on the Find/Replace panel, the
tab is removed.
The Find/Replace panel is in the file called FindReplaceDialog since we
wanted to avoid the complications involved with removing and then readding
files to the project.

Added case matching option to Find/Replace.

Disabled "replace all" when the find field is empty since this causes DrJava
to hang.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@775 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Made icons in the toolbar configurable, as well as the font used
in the toolbar buttons.  Both icons and text are on by default.

New Config options:
toolbar.icons.enabled, toolbar.text.enabled
font.toolbar.name, font.toolbar.size, font.toolbar.style

Also organized the OptionConstants file.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@777 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

A find next action can now be repeated by hitting the "enter" key.

Every time the find command is called, the find field gets the focus.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@779 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

VERY minor changes in PreviewFrame:

 + The "Print Preview" frame now has a "Print..." button, instead of the
   misleading "Print" button of yore.

 + The "Print Preview" frame will now close itself after the _print() method
   has been completed. It used to remain active even after one had dispatched
   or cancelled a print job -- I thought it should probably show itself the
   door.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@781 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Automatically append ".java" to unappended, chosen filenames when saving with a
 JavaSourceFilter selected.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@783 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed the disabled scrollbar (on OS X) bug (512972).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@785 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added additional syntax higlighting for request 540319. DrJava now also support syntax highlighting for types and numbers. A token is considered to be a type if it is a primitive type (int, void, boolean,etc) or if it is capitalized. Colors are also configurable in the .drjava file


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@787 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed a problem with repeated calls to find next. Rapid presses of the enter
would actually insert newlines into the text instead of calling find next
again.

Also added the feature of insertable and removable tabs. All panels that go
into the tabbed pane and do not need to always be shown (interactions pane
and console) must extend TabbedPanel.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@789 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Began work on a more robust parsing method for the ".drjava" file
Temporary work-around for bug#568587 from chaynes, which catches the exception
 caused by JUnit's System.exit and provides details as to the error which
 invoked the exception.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@791 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

The interactions pane is the tab that is selected upon starting Dr. Java


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@793 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed IndentTest failure when configuration indent.level is defined (and not
equal to 2).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@795 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Quick fix for NullPointerExceptions thrown when initially running JUnit tests
when the tab was not already open.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@797 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Disabled the fix for the "disabled scrollbar" bug, since it
caused problems with the knob size when switching between
active documents.  More work will have to go into this later.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@799 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Made changes such that none of the insertable/removabable (dynamic) tabs
have to be shown when DrJava begins execution. Added the
compileErrorDuringJUnit method to the GlobalModelListener and changed
the testDoNotRunJUnitWhenCompileErrorsOccurs method in
GlobalModelJUnitTest().


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@801 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Made changes such that the dynamic tabs can be hidden upon DrJava startup.
Had to add the compileErrorDuringJUnit method to GlobalModelListener and
change a test case in GlobalModelJUnitTest
(testDoNotRunJUnitWhenCompileErrorsOccur).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@802 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fix for bug 568245. This version has improved support for anonymous inner
classes. Also, ')' on empty lines are now left justified. The numbering of
Questions/Actions in the Indenter class and the associated documentation
are now out of date. Perhaps correct them if no other changes in Indent are
needed.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@804 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Addresses Ease of Use Issue 567848. Added an exception handler that catches
uncaught exception that propagate up to Actions. It displays a panel that
contains a description of the exception, a message asking the user to submit
a bug report, and the stack trace.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@806 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added support for headless AWT on MacOS-X (a dock icon should no
longer appear for the Interpreter JVM)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@808 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed the message that is displayed in the UncaughtExceptionWindow and
changed the position of the OK button to the lower-right of the top panel.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@810 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Addresses bug 568593. ColoredPane now extends PlainView instead of
WrappedPlainView. This allows the user to type text off the right side of
the definitions pane, the pane automatically becomes wider, and a
horizontal scrollbar appears as needed. The window can now be resized by the
user and there are no problems anymore.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@812 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Addresses bug 512972. To fix the disabled scrollbar encountered on OSX
whenever another file is opened, the scrollbar on the previously open
document is replaced by a new JScrollBar with exactly the same properties
(minimum, maximum, value, and extent).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@814 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed the build-common.xml to automatically compile the TstampGMT class when it's missing.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@816 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed bug 552691. Reimplemented line numbers using a ui level algorithm.
The new method calculates the current line by comparing the size of the DefinitionsPane to the size of each line. This is a O(1) algorithm. The only small quirk is that there the top left pos in the pane is (3,3). So currently a size 6 or smaller font will cause the line numbers to be off.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@817 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added CodeStatus to allow for labeling blocks of code as included in the
next stable release or code that is still under development.
Included the debugger as a development feature.
Fixed the format method of ColorOption.
Set a margin for the Help>About dialog and centered it.
Cleaned up UncaughtException window.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@819 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added support for stable and development targets for specifying whether to
make developmental code enabled and testable. The "commit" target commits the
development version, while the "commit-stable" target commits the stable
version.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@821 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Resolved ease of use issue 543703, where a file is reopened.
Now that we have a revert option, if a file is modified and
the user attempts to reopen it, he is prompted whether or
not to revert to the saved copy.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@822 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Committing a beta-release version of DrJava, based on drjava-20020619-0142.
The CodeStatus.DEVELOPMENT flag is set to false, so all new features will
be disabled until after the beta-test period and stable release.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@824 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

New set of icons to use with DrJava OS X package.  These are the standard set for generic Java apps under OS X.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@826 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added KeyStrokeOption and a corresponding JUnit test file to the config
package. These will be used to allow for configurable key-bindings. This is
developmental at this point.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@827 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Implemented a row header Rule within the DefinitionsPane for the purpose of
line enumeration, as per feature req. #508676("Line enumeration.") Also made
the line enumeration option configurable by LINEENUM_ENABLED (false, by default)
within OptionConstants.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@829 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added better error handling in the Config code.  If a user has an
invalid ".drjava" file, the Configuration object now resets to the
default values, and stores the exception that was thrown.  MainFrame
later checks to see if there was an exception, and displays a
useful message when starting up.

Also significantly improved documentation in some of the Config
classes.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@831 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Combined the elements of all configurable fonts (main, doclist, toolbar), formerly
represented by a StringOption and two IntegerOptions, in a new Option class called
FontOption. FontOption relies on Font.decode() to parse a String in the format,
"fontname-FONTSTYLE-fontsize." Therefore, in all future development copies of the
code, a custom font must be configured in ".drjava" using this format; naturally,
the older way  is still supported in the stable code base. The new option
constants' identifiers for each FontOption are simply the old identifiers,
truncated before the second underscore (e.g. FONT_MAIN, from FONT_MAIN_NAME).

Implemented live update functionality for FONT_MAIN, FONT_DOCLIST, FONT_TOOLBAR,
TOOLBAR_ICONS_ENABLED, TOOLBAR_TEXT_ENABLED, and INDENT_LEVEL.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@833 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Failed to add FontOption or its test on earlier commit.

Added live update functionality for line enumeration, and began work on
similar functionality for custom colors.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@835 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

changed build-common to automatically include the built dir in the TstampGMT classpath.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@837 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Resolved bug 573207 (No System.err in Interactions).  System.err is
now displayed in red, while Interactions errors are now displayed
in bold dark red.

Also fixed the FontOptionTest to work across platforms, since the
default font (after a failed parse) is different on different machines.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@838 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Addresses Feature Request 507370. Allows configurable key bindings for the
menu items that already had accelerators, methods in the DefaultEditorKit
(e.g. move the cursor to the end of the line), and for cutting the rest of
the line.
Supports live updating of key-bindings.
KeyBindingManager is the class that handles this.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@840 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Continued adding live update functionality to the remaining option constants.
Added live update support for DEFINITION_MATCH_COLOR, the color of the matching
  brace highlighting (in CompilerErrorPanel and DefinitionsPane).
Responded to bug #573769 by removing all references to the Config object from
  the compilers and setting the values of corresponding 'location' fields
  contained within each loaded compiler via methods in CompilerProxy, which
  has a reference to the correct Config object.
This bug fix also allows for live update of JSR14_COLLECTIONSPATH and
  EXTRA_CLASSPATH, though complete support for the latter required additional
  changes to the DefaultGlobalModel. It was necessary to add an OptionListener
  on EXTRA_CLASSPATH only in the DefaultGlobalModel, so that the classpath used
  by the REPL could be reliably updated.
Also added live update support for JSR14_LOCATION and JAVAC_LOCATION.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@842 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Resolved bug 573931, where closing some dialog windows could crash
DrJava because of an unexpected return code.

Resolved bug 573933, where hitting ESC (the keyboard shortcut for
Abort Current Interaction) didn't abort the current interaction.
Fixed by changing the default shortcut to CTRL+ESC.

Resolved bug 573932 by adding key binding logic for the "end of
document" action.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@844 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Hitting ESC while the focus is anywhere in the find/replace tab will close the
tab and return focus to the definitions window. CTRL+F will cause the text in
the find field to be selected and put the cursor there. Hitting F3 while focus
is in the definitions pane will pop up the find/replace tab, run Find Next,
but keep focus in the definitions pane.
Also, added delete previous character and delete next character
configurability.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@846 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added live update support for HISTORY_MAX_SIZE.
Fixed a small bug in FontOption, concerning the format() and which Font method
 (i.e. getFontName(), getName(), getFamily()) was truly desired in formatting
 a given Font to its String representation.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@848 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added OutputStreamRedirector so both DrJava.java and InteractionsJVM.java
have access to it.  Also fixed the build.xml so that the stable and
development targets don't have an effect in the util package.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@850 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Updated build-common.xml to not apply the stable and development
targets to the util package.  (Since a drjava commit doesn't force
a util commit, it's very easy for a "development" commit of util to
be included in a "stable" release of drjava.  There's not much code
volatility in the util package anyway, so we just won't use the
release process there.)

Also added a docs_dir property to prepare for the new documentation
framework (using docbook).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@852 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed all standard out and err output to go the the DrJava console
instead of the actual console.  (This includes output from JUnit tests.)
Requires an update of the util package, which includes the
OutputStreamRedirector class.

Also fixed the javadoc incompatibility with Java 1.3 by naming the
anonymous inner classes in the ConfigurationTool and OptionConstants
interface.

Cleaned up CodeStatus.orig, and updated the build.xml with respect
to the release process and the util package.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@853 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Created a ConfigFrame for the purpose of a Preferences window, which has
a JTree to display the different categories of configurable options. The nodes
of this tree are of a DefaultMutableTreeNode subclass (defined within
ConfigFrame) called TreePanelNode, each of which contains the corresponding
ConfigPanel for displaying and altering the config options. Clicking a node in
the tree switches the panel which is displayed within the main panel, by
removing the last loaded panel and adding the panel contained within the
selected node.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@855 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added some of the OptionComponents that are to be added to the ConfigPanel.
They allow the user to see the current values of the configuration settings
as well as change them as they are running DrJava.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@857 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Last commit didn't work. This time adding some OptionComponents that allow
the user to see the current value of a setting and change it while DrJava
is running.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@859 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Quick fix for bug 574761. Fixed bug that occured when opening non-existent files in jdk1.3. This is because jdk1.3 returns an empty array (while jdk1.4 returned an array with a single null element). So this fix adds a check for an empty array.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@861 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Interim fix for bug# 543881, pertaining to JSR14v1.2's incompatibility with
DrJava. The JSR14 compiler is no longer loaded if an invalid version of the JDK
is in use (i.e. the constructor for Log object does not match that of JDK1.3,
JDK1.4, or JSR14v1.0)
Also added JUnitErrorModelTest, a test file for JUnit which was accidentally
never added to the codebase.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@863 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Restored ESC to Abort Interaction, made CTRL+B clear the current line when
the focus is in the InteractionsPane, and fixed Shift+HOME to select to
the prompt instead of the left margin.

Also removed the version tag from CodeStatus.orig so that it doesn't
need to be committed every time.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@865 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Committing the initial documentation framework for DrJava.
The docbook XML files can be translated to HTML using the
"docs" ant target, as long as "docbook2html" is on your path.

Changes to the documentation can be committed using the
"commit-docs" ant target (without running the tests).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@867 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Wrote first draft of the "Editing Programs" chapter, included
outline for chapters on interactions, compiler, and junit.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@868 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Continued improving the layout of the preferences window. We used Layout
 managers to set the sizes of the components precisely.
Added reset() and update() methods to reset the value of the option fields to
 their stored settings and to update the stored value with a new legal value,
 where applicable.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@869 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Several small bug fixes:

 - Setting toolbar icons disabled wasn't working. (Fixed now.)
 - The default working directory is now empty instead of the user's
   current directory.  The behavior is still the same, but before,
   saving the configuration froze the user's current directory at
   the time to be their working directory in perpetuity.  Fixed now.
 - The default color for numbers is now a dark cyan, to help distinguish
   between the letter O and the number 0.
   (User documentation has been updated with this default.)
 - The history.max.size option now has a sanity check (for negative values).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@871 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added 'Apply' and 'Set as Default' buttons.
Began handling bad input from entry fields of OptionComponents. Changed all
 update() methods to return false if invalid input is encountered when setting
 option constants.
Added color chooser dialog for Color panel.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@873 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed bug 547229, where the InteractionsJVM died after the system went
to sleep.

Also did a lot of code cleanup / documentation updates.  Notably, moved
AWTExceptionHandler to the ui package and renamed Rule.java to
LineEnumRule.java.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@875 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Finished KeyStrokeOptionComponent which is the graphical display of
KeyStrokeOptions. Integrated it with the ConfigFrame so that users can now
view and change their keyboard configurations while working in DrJava.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@877 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed the layout for the panels in the configuration window so that the
labels all line up on the right and are just long enough to fit the longest
label. Added FileOptionComponent which allows the user to configure files.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@879 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Resolved bug 576081, where compiler errors on the last line of
the file caused a NullPointer in the highlighting.  (Off-by-one
error in CompilerErrorModel.)

Also updated KeyStrokeOption to work on OS X by replacing any
occurance of "command" with "meta" in the parse method.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@881 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Finished the first draft of the user documentation, including
chapters on the interactions pane, compiler integration, and
JUnit integration.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@883 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

The credit to Chris Haynes didn't appear correctly, so it's
commented out for now.  It will be added to the credits section
at the end.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@884 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added VectorOptionComponent which will allow the live updating of options
such as classpath. Changed KeyStrokeOptionComponents so that the input field
is focused every time the dialog opens. Also the input field's text
defaults to the current keystroke bound to the option that was clicked.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@885 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Implemented the FontOptionComponent for choosing new fonts from the preferences
  window.
Improved other option components so that they check to see if the new choice
 for any given option is equivalent to its previous setting -- in that event,
 no change is made to the .drjava file.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@887 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

The ToolbarOptionComponent for jointly configuring the TOOLBAR_TEXT_ENABLED
 and the TOOLBAR_ICONS_ENABLED options, using JRadioButtons.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@889 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

The FontChooser, as adapted from NwFontChooserS by Noah Wiarauch. Used for
 choosing a new font for our FontOptions in the preferences window.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@891 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Converted Reset Interactions to have the semantics of Abort Current
Interaction, in that it completely restarts the Interactions JVM.
(This is because it needs to clean up any existing threads after
a reset.)  The UI has been updated to only have a Reset button, and
not an Abort.

Also fixed Font and ColorOptionComponent to be able to set themselves
back to the original color.  (Bug in development code.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@893 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Switched the title and text for the Save Before Closing dialog,
per Ease of Use issue 571058.

Also updated KeyStrokeOption and its Test to replace "Option"
with "Alt" for Mac OS X, and removed references to the "blah"
file options (which were tests).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@895 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Committing the stable version in preparation for a stable release.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@896 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

A list of the most recently open files has been implemented. If a file in the
recent file list cannot be opened, it shows a dialog saying as much. This
feature forces DrJava to write the configuration to disk upon exiting. This
appears in a nicer format now since the elements are written in the order they
are stored in the OptionMap instead of the random order Properties.store()
put them in.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@898 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Partial completion of #573782. This new version does try to perform case sensitive file name changes in Windows. Now, DrJava trys to compare the name of the file to the canonical name of the file. Half the time, this works. The other half, the JFileChooser does not return the correct user-entered value. This is a bug in the swing JFileChooser. A work around is to prefix the file name with '.\'.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@900 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added command-line batch indenter


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@902 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Implemented FileOptions in place of the previous StringOptions for representing
DrJava's resource locations.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@903 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Complete implementation for request #573782. This version adds the ability to automatically detect what to save a blank file as. DrJava uses the name of the first top-level class or interface in the file.

This has not been tested on mac.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@905 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

- Improved SavableConfiguration so that it doesn't write out options
   which are equal to their default values.  (Smaller .drjava files)

 - Added buttons in the Config frame to reset configurable options
   to their default values, one panel at a time.  Apply and OK now
   immediately save the settings to the config file.  Also
   refactored the OptionComponent code and improved comments.

 - Widened the ConfigFrame a little as a temporary fix to the long
   label problem.  (Could still use a multi-line label...)

 - Resolved bug 578421 by returning focus to the DefinitionsPane
   after cut, copy, paste, undo, and redo.

 - DrJava no longer checks for modified files on disk when it is
   in the process of closing all files.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@907 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Addresses featurn request 567579. Load History and Save History features have
been added. Loading a history will cause Dynamic Java to interpret all the
lines in the history file as one block. This makes the output cleaner, but
causes all lines after any line that contains an error to be ignored. The
user can fix a history files by editing it. Directly editing history files
must be done by loading the history file in the normal way. Right now, history
files use the extension ".hist".


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@909 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added InteractionsHistoryFilter for the load and save dialogs,
and refactored some of the related code in MainFrame.

Also fixed a problem with the current directory in the normal
Save FileChooser (caused when getClassName returned nothing).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@911 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Deprecated the old Font-related options in OptionConstants, and removed all
 references to them from other code.
Implemented tests over all OptionComponents.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@913 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Allows the history to be "gotten" as a String.
Added tests for saving, clearing, and loading interaction histories.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@914 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Removed a println in DefinitionsDocument to prepare for a release.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@916 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the ability to configure the maximum number of files to keep track
of as well as a test for RecentFileManager.

Created NonNegativeIntegerOption which subclasses IntegerOption that throws
an OptionParseException if given a negative integer.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@918 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Refactored CompilerInterface to allow multiple source roots, which
allows us to add a Compile All action.  (This action is implemented
and tested, and available in the Tools menu.)

Also gave ColorOptionComponent the ability to display a color as a
background color (eg. for brace-matching color).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@920 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Committing the beginning of the new debugger code.  DrJava no longer
needs JSwat at all-- debugging is done using the JPDA / JDI interfaces
directly on the Interactions JVM.  Currently the DebugManager can
attach and detach to the JVM, set and hit breakpoints, and resume.
Suspend "works", but freezes all of DrJava.  (Ack.)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@922 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Updated the FontChooser with new code from Noah W.  It can now be resized.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@924 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added an EventHandler that will handle events(!) that occur in the VM that is
being debugged. Right now, it can handle breakpoint events and vm death and
disconnect events.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@926 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Tagging previous failed commit


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@927 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed BooleanOption and VectorOption to allow input with leading and ending
whitespace, as well as non-lowercase characters.
Added Breakpoint object, and refactored relevant debugger code to include it.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@928 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

- Removed config option for Debugger, which is now always on (in
   Development mode) if JPDA is on the classpath.
 - Commented two test lines in the Clear Console action.
 - The config file is no longer saved on quit if there was an error
   parsing the config file on startup.  It's usually saved on quit
   to remember recent files, but we don't want to overwrite a user's
   config file with defaults just because they have a typo.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@930 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Provides a fix for the console causing DrJava to hang because of its
ScrollToEndDocumentListener. Added the same DocumentListener to the
Interactions Pane so that it will scroll to the bottom whenever text is
inserted.

Removes extraneous println statements that are caused when key-bindings
are configured.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@932 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added preliminary support for contextual menus within the DefinitionsPane


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@934 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Allows toggling of breakpoints, printing of currently set breakpoints, and
undoes the change to InteractionsPane which added a scrollToEndOfDocument
Listener since this was causing the cursor to move to the end of the
document whenever text was inserted, even if the current line was being
edited.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@936 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Breakpoints can now be toggled and seem to work. Added DebugAction which
will be a superclass of the actions that our debugger will use. Also added
PendingRequestManager which keeps track of actions that are waiting upon
the preparation of a class to be resolved.

The StickyClassLoader is no longer used both to make the DebugManager work and
because since we restart the InteractionsJVM every time we compile or
reset so that optimization is not used right now.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@938 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a HighlightManager for intelligently storing highlights in a stack, so
that more recently made highlights appear on top of older ones, rather than
the Highlighter default behavior.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@939 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added License Agreement to IndentFile
Completed the contextual menu functionality for DefinitionsPane and added
 flexible highlighting support using a new HighlightManager (in our util package).
It might be noted that it was also necessary to change the accessibility of
 some fields and methods in MainFrame, so DefinitionsPane's popup menu
 could share them.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@940 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the StringOps class which right now allows us to take a string and
replace all occurences of a substring with another string


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@941 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the capability to jump to the line in the source that a thread is
suspended at although it is still buggy. Also refactored DebugAction so that
DebugActions that correspond to certain OpenDefinitionsDocuments subclass
DocumentDebugAction which in turn extends DebugAction. Also, rudimentary
stepping is now available although this is still buggy as well. This is being
committed in this state so that we can begin integrating highlighting into the
breakpoints and stepping.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@943 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed "Debug Mode" menu item from a JCheckBoxMenuItem to a
JRadioButtonMenuItem with a checkbox icon as a workaround to a known
bug in Mac OS X's implementation of Java.  (It used to fire the event twice.)

Also updated InteractionsPane to always scroll to the bottom unless
the caret is past the prompt (in which case, the user is typing a
command).


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@944 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Stored the DebugAction and OpenDefDoc (if there is one) on the EventRequest
so that they can be accessed later.  ScrollLineToSource in DebugManager
now checks to see if it already knows the Document before looking on the
source root set, and the listener has been updated accordingly.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@946 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a remove() method to HighlightInfo, so that it can take care of removing
 itself from whatever document it happens to be on.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@948 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Implemented highlighted breakpoints and threads, so that a highlight may be set
 at the same position as a breakpoint and a highlight is shown at whichever line is being evaluated in the current thread.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@950 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added keyboard bindings to the debugger actions.

Fixed OutputPane's ScrollToEndListener to work on Windows (it was having
problems with newlines when using getText().length(), so now it uses
e.getDocument().getLength().)

Fixed InteractionPane so it always scrolls to the end after updates,
even when stepping in the debugger.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@952 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Resolved (hopefully) all the synchronization issues with the Reduced
Model.  Before, multiple threads could enter Reduced Model methods at
the same time, wreaking havoc on the cursor position.  Now, only the
DefinitionsDocument is permitted to manipulate the Reduced Model, and
all methods which reference the Reduced Model are now synchronized.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@954 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a method in GlobalModel to allow the Debugger to print messages
(eg. when a breakpoint is hit).

Also cleaned up the DebugManager code (synchronization issues, documentation,
etc.), and updated the documentation to mention the "java Classname" feature.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@956 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Fixed bugs in the debugger, added the ability to configure whether DrJava
source files should be stepped through, and fixed the history so that
repeated instructions would be stored in history (in case repeated calls
are needed for saving history).
Fixes scrolling to the line in the source file that a breakpoint or step
event occurs at. Fixes duplicate step requests on the same thread.
Enables or disables debug menu items based on whether the current thread is
null, suspended, or resumed.
Commented out print lines.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@958 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

The debugger now prints a message when stepping indicating the class,
method, and line number reached.

A configurable sourcepath option has been added to allow users to
specify where to look for files that the debugger wants to display.
In this process, the extra.classpath was changed from a Vector of
Strings to a Vector of Files.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@959 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the configuration options of stepping through DrJava, Java, and Dynamic
Java source code.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@961 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Improved the Display All Breakpoints message.

Synchronized the thread suspend and resume notifiers on DebugManager
so that the menu items aren't incorrectly shown and then hidden.

Added a message about how to use the debugger if tools.jar isn't
already on the classpath (on the debugger tab of preferences).

Changed checkbox preferences to have a label on the right, and
put a border around the toolbar icons button group.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@963 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a rough draft of a chapter on the debugger, to help users with
the development release.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@964 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Forgot to add LabelComponent to ui/config in the last commit.  (Oops)


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@966 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the capability to watch fields and local variables to the
debugger. Seems to work except for the case when the thread is in an inner
class and the user is watching a non-static field belonging to an outer class.
Right now, the current thread's stack trace is walked to try to find a
StackFrame whose ReferenceType is the same as the ReferenceType for the
outer class that the watched field belongs to. If a match is not found, the
field cannot be watched and its value is set to null. Also, the values of the
watched fields are currently being displayed in the console. They will later
be displayed in the GUI.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@968 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

- Added test cases for DebugManager (finally).
 - Moved some debug event notifications from DebugManager to EventHandler
 - Added additional DebugListener methods
 - Resolved several debug synchronization issues


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@970 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Breakpoints in a document are now removed when the document is closed,
because the breakpoint would have a stale pointer to an old
OpenDefinitionsDocument if it was left around.  (Tests updated.)

Added a hidden split panel for the debugger GUI elements which can
be displayed when debug mode is on.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@972 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed DebugPanel to show breakpoints, watchpoints, threads, and current stack
frame as well as adding buttons for resuming the debugger, stepping, and
shutting the debugger down.
Fixed the key-binding bug related to compiling errors.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@974 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Resolved many threading issues between the debugger and Swing.  The Swing
tutorial states that ONLY the event-dispatching thread should update the
GUI, so several calls to SwingUtilities.invokeLater are now made to
improve the behavior.

Also worked on the DebugPanel UI, added ability to add/remove watches in
the table, and gave the DebugPanel a DebugListener to decouple it from
MainFrame.

Added a HelpFrame and Help icon for browsing the user documentation.
The docs should be compiled on a machine with docbook using "ant docs".


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@976 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added SwingWorker from Sun's tutorial on threads in Swing.
Use it on any operation in the GUI which is expected to
take a long time.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@978 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a Swing timer on step requests so that "Stepping..." is printed
out if the step does not complete after 2 seconds.  (Updated DebugTest
to reflect the new stepRequested event.)

Used a SwingWorker thread to compile and reset the interactions pane,
since both are lengthy operations.

Prevented the help browser from following links outside the documentation.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@980 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Breakpoints in the DebugPanel's breakpoint tree are now inserted in order of
increasing line number.

Attempting to debug any document which has been modified since its last save
will issue a brief warning regarding the unexpected inconsistencies one might
encounter while stepping through source that differs from the class files.
Any attempt to set breakpoints in an unnamed document without a file will be
refused; setting breakpoint in modified documents will ask if the user realizes
what he/she's doing, but gives the option of still setting the breakpoint.
All warnings will only appear once per document, and won't be seen again unless
the document is reverted.

Reverting a document now removes all of its old and possibly invalid breakpoints.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@982 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Improves the performance of the Debugger's step function. If duplicate step
requests are encountered while the thread is suspended, the first step
request is deleted.

Showing the threads tab is a configurable option now.

The values of watchpoints are updated as the watches are entered as well as
during each suspension of the thread.

The UncaughtExceptionWindow's layout has been changed. The ok button is now
at the bottom of the window instead of at the right side since this was
causing some text to be cut off.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@984 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Removed CodeStatus.DEVELOPMENT tags on features which are ready to move
to the stable build.

Made the Fonts and Colors config categories visible by default in the
Preferences window.  Also made the Find/Replace field font work with
live update of config options.

Changed CompilerErrorPanel to display just the classname of an error
instead of the fully qualified filename.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@986 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed about box, added more graphics.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@988 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Significantly updated the user documentation, including the debugger
and configuration chapters.

Added a close button to Help Frame and fixed the size and resource problems
with the new About Dialog.  Also edited a few of the messages and config
labels that are displayed to users.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@990 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Changed margins (from 7/30/2002) and borders.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@992 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added the HistorySaveDialog which appears when the user chooses to Save
Interactions History. The dialog will have a text area that contains the
current history and allow the user to edit and save the history to a file.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@994 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Both compiler error and JUnit error highlights utilize the Highlight manager,
 and have the ability to be toggled on and off in the source, for better
 readability of the underlying code.
One line was moved in the revertFile method to avoid clearing the active
 document in the event that the file from which a reversion was to take place
 is discovered to be missing. The ensuing exception is now thrown prior to the
 clear.
Added the ability to view the stack trace for any JUnit error. Right clicking
 an error in the JUnitErrorListPane presents a popup menu with the single
 option of "Show Stack Trace." Clicking displays a non-modal frame  to the
 user with the complete stack trace for the desired JUnit error.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@995 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Removed the JSwat jar, because we don't need it any more.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@996 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Improved config option component usability by adding more noticable
buttons for font/color/keybinding choosers.

Fixed support for Swing in the Interactions pane on OS X by removing
the "headless AWT" option from the JVM startup.

Made background, error, and debug highlight colors configurable.

Removed old highlight tests from Definitions Pane.

Added instructions on generating docs in HelpFrame when in the
DEVELOPMENT mode.

Made Compile All more of the default (over Compile Current) and gave
it a key binding (F5).

Added "docs" to the release target in ant.

Started work on Revert All, but it is currently causing problems
with the reduced model when a doc is not displayed.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@997 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added help frame history, changed About look, added menu mnemonics.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@999 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added ability for OpenDefinitionsDocuments to check if they are in sync
with their class files. The debugger takes advantage of this information
by displaying a message in a status bar that pops up below the debug panel
telling the user that the source and the class files are not in sync and
that a compilation should be done. Also, compile all now passes the compiler
only those open documents that are not in sync.

Watches were updated so that the display of the values of watched variables
differentiate between null and out of scope.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@1001 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added a subclass of javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel that always returns fals for isCellEditable();


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@1003 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Added Preferences icon support, committing in the Close "X" graphic, except creating close buttons hasn't been added in yet (to be done later).  Also changed some UI appearance for the HelpFrame and AboutDialog.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@1005 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff

Re-formatted the GPL to adjust the linebreaks for the AboutDialog

Added support in "ant clean" to clean up the osx build.


git-svn-id: file:///tmp/test-svn/trunk@1007 fe72c1cf-3628-48e9-8b72-1c46755d3cff
